#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<climits>
#include<set>
#include<fstream>
#include<cmath>
#include<bitset>
#include<map>
#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#define test(t) while(t--)
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)

#define p(n) printf("%lld\n",n)
#define rep(i,a,n) for(i=a;i<=n;i++)
#define vi vector<int>
#define vii vector< vector<int> >
#define vpii vector< pair<int,int> >
#define mii map<int,int>
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000LL
#define mp make_pair
#define MOD 1000000007LL

//#define inf 100000000
#define ll  long long
using namespace std;
int grundy(int ar[])
{
 int i;
 int f=0;
 for(i=0;i<=5;++i)
 if(ar[i])
 f=1;
 if(f==0)
 return 0;
 else
 {
 // cout<<"helllo\n";
  int mex[51],j,k,l;
  memset(mex,0,sizeof(mex));
  for(i=0;i<=5;++i)
  {
    for(j=0;j<=ar[i];++j)
    {
      for(k=0;k<=ar[(i+1)%6];++k)
      {
        for(l=0;l<=ar[(i+2)%6];++l)
        {
         //cout<<j<<" "<<k<<" "<<l<<endl;
         if((j==ar[i]) && (k==ar[(i+1)%6]) && (l==ar[(i+2)%6]))
         continue;
         else
         {
          // getchar();
          // cout<<i<<" "<<j<<" "<<k<<" "<<l<<endl;
          int a,b,c;
          a=ar[i];b=ar[(i+1)%6];c=ar[(i+2)%6];
          ar[i]=j;
          ar[(i+1)%6]=k;
          ar[(i+2)%6]=l;
          int val=grundy(ar);
          mex[val]=1;
          ar[i]=a;ar[(i+1)%6]=b;ar[(i+2)%6]=c;
         }
        }
      }
    }
  }

  int ans=0;
  while(mex[ans])
  ans++;
  return ans;
 }
}
int main()
{
int a[6],i,ele=-1;
for(i=0;i<6;++i)
{
cin>>a[i];
}
int x=a[0]+a[1]+a[2];
int y=a[1]+a[2]+a[3];
int z=a[2]+a[3]+a[4];
int p=a[3]+a[4]+a[5];
int gru=x^y^z^p;
if(gru)
cout<<"Winning\n";
else
cout<<"Losing\n";
}
